content: dive into the world of amigurumi with our adorable crochetasaurus rex pattern whether you re an adventurous beginner or an experienced maker this pattern is perfect for anyone eager to try their hand at crocheting a cute baby t-rex toy accessible for beginners through advanced crocheters includes step-by-step video tutorials for each part of the pattern links to videos in pdf perfect introduction to amigurumi toy making the free version of the crochetasaurus rex pattern has been split into three parts to make creating him a little more manageable and so you can crochet along with us please reference the posts below for each part of the cal and instructions **april 5 ** arms legs & tail https //theloopylamb com/easy-crochet-t-rex-pattern-free-crochet-along-tutorial/ **april 12 ** head/body & eyelids **april 19 ** spikes & assembly > don t want to wait to make your t-rex > or prefer to work from a print out > grab an ad-free printable copy of the > full pattern here on ravelry or in my > etsy https //tidd ly/4aauiye shop **language ** english **skill level ** easy **finished size ** approx 7 5 inches **terminology ** written in us terminology **materials needed ** 3 25 mm d crochet hook keenan hand dyed yarn in three beautiful shades worsted weight 20 mm safety eyes polyester stuffing essential crochet tools including scissors tapestry needle and stitch markers view the crochet along homepage here for more information plus the live weekly designer chat schedule https //theloopylamb com/free-crochetasaurus-rex-dinosaur-amigurumi-crochet-along/ https
